member.name: M:NumericalCalculator.Chart.Clear
member.summary: Clears old chart and generates new clear chart with coordinate system

member.param: Function type to draw on chart

member.name: M:NumericalCalculator.Chart.DrawFT(NumericalCalculator.FunctionTypeEnum,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.param: Function type to draw. Only FT or IFT are correct in this function.
Used with IFT to remove noise from function

member.name: M:NumericalCalculator.Chart.DrawDifferential(NumericalCalculator.FunctionTypeEnum,System.Double[])
member.param: Function type. Only Differential or DifferentialII are correct in this function.
0. Starting point 1. Starting point function value 2. Second derivative starting point function value

member.summary: Drawing the Bessel, Neumann or Hypergeometric functions chart
